lead_paragraph: George Whitfield Jr., a 33-year-old San Diego-based quarterback coach, played a major role in reversing the tide of criticism directed at the No. 1 draft pick Cam Newton.
snippet: George Whitfield Jr., a 33-year-old San Diego-based quarterback coach, played a major role in reversing the tide of criticism directed at the No. 1 draft pick Cam Newton.
